author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This is a complementary PR to previous backport #35391 related to new files reported in #35399.

#### PR validation:

Basic PR workflow tests passed. The same tests done in #35391 were done, just the rebase to the IB release missed a few files that should be merged.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

#35391 related to #35399

FYI @fabferro @jan-kaspar
title: Backport of new files for PPS geometry
